scripts.prebuild: rm -rf target && mkdir -p target && yarn transpile && cp -r package.json target/ && cp -r src/* target/src/
scripts.build: cd target && yarn --production && zip -r run.zip package.json node_modules src
scripts.deploy-init: cd deploy && cd terraform && terraform init
scripts.predeploy: cd deploy && cd terraform && terraform plan
scripts.deploy: cd deploy && cd terraform && terraform apply
